Posts.Content: Hi I’m so sorry you feel anxious about the hospital  i had a mastectomy in January, I had the op at 2pm had to be at the hospital at 11, my belongings stayed with me until I went Down, I kept my dressing gown with me, when I came round everything was in my room & my dressing gown had been put in a clear bag & took to my room, everything was there, I think now they are a lot better with this kind of thing as it just gives the hospital a bad name  try not to over think it, maybe phone ur hospital to see if they have lockers etc   slso I did come home in the same day as I was determined not to stay in hospital over night i was told as long as everything is ok then I could go & I did   hope all goes well, but really try not to over stress about it xx
Posts.Title: Going into hospital

Posts.Content: Hi   u will be absolutely fine once u get ur plan everything moves very quickly trust me  you’ll have more appointments etc but it’s a good thing as at least u know what they gonna do & when it’s done etc the hospital doctors nurses etc are brilliant just remember they do this everyday to thousands of people that just like u will batter it’s ass !   The unknow is the hardest thing but please. Please do not google ! Listen to ur medical team & chat away on here that’s what it’s here for ... to rant ask cry etc I’ve  also phoned the McMillan line & they are brilliant if u want to talk to someone... no such thing as a silly question  ask away !   I’m half way through chemo yes I have some bad days but I also have an awful lot of good days    I feel like I can plan a little now knowing when my good days are  Try not to be too scared but I know how u feel as I was the same but it will all happen so quickly I started chemo in June & already at my half way point ... I just wanna get on with it  73days until my last chemo & counting   your the strongest person u know x
Posts.Title: Morning after diagnosis.....

Posts.Content: Hi & welcome  I totaly understand how ur feeling about the money worries, I’m self employed so if I don’t work I don’t get any money & of course if I can’t work then I just can’t, I’ve looked into all sorts & purly because I’m self employed there isn’t any help available.... although I’ve just applied for P.I.P I’m on the understanding that this doesn’t go on ur incomings or how much u have in the bank etc but may be able to get a little of something & anything is a bonus    Look it up on google I spoke to someone & 3 days later the paperwork arrived the lady I spoke to said I would have to send everything (documents) by post but also heard that if u go to ur local job centre they will scan everything for u & send it from there   (apparently they want the real documents not a copy but I’m reluctant to send these through the post ) so if it’s true that the job centre can do it for u then another bonus   hope this helps & fingers crossed it’s a little towards u living ur life xx
Posts.Title: Hello, I’m new to this and would love a friendly hello

Posts.Content: so on my 2nd round of chemo  with 6 more to go  3 days of steroids & finding today (the same as my last round) day 5 & 6 the fatigue is just terrible   is it because the steroids have stopped or just the chemo doing it’s thing ? Or both ?  I’m currently layed flat out in the sofa  with a fan on me & this lovely English summer (only we can have The hottest summer ever whilst going through chemo)   aching beyond aching  & just don’t know what to do with myself other than lay here  I know I need to listen to my body  I’m drinking loads of juice & water  but any other advice or tips anyone can give would be greatly appreciated   thanks x
Posts.Title: Fatigue tiredness etc etc

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply  i mentioned it to my oncology dr the first time, he said it was prob down to the steroids I’ve been put on some injections to stop the white blood cells from dropping too much ( or at least I think that’s what they said they was for) as I had a real bad bout of it last time & ended up at the hospital getting checked   so I guess this time I wasn’t expecting it to be as bad  ... which it probably isn’t but it’s not  far off   Ive had no sickness either just this tiredness that is totaly beyond tiredness   ill mention it again to him next time I go  but lovely if you could keep me posted ... I just think these kinda days are a complete wash out
